resources.string: Service Connection with GAssist has been established.
Service Connection with GAssist has been terminated.
Service Connection has already been existed!!!
Service Connection has already been disconnected!!!
Service Connection from GAssist has been accepted.

Welcome to GAssist.Net companion app. 
 This wizard will guide you through the necessary setup. Let's start with granting the app a necessary permisions.
 

Click check permissions button to begin.
Finally authenticate with Google to get the Credentials
In order to function properly the application needs to be whitelisted in the battery optimization... Click \n check battery to start...
